elements.title: Jesse L. Douglas (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that African-American civil rights activist Jesse L. Douglas (pictured) was called an "unidentified white man" during protests in 1965?

elements.title: Auditorium of the Old Burgtheater (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that 133 notable Viennese personalities are in Gustav Klimt's Auditorium of the Old Burgtheater?

elements.title: murdering a police officer ten years ago today (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the family of a man charged with murdering a police officer ten years ago today were surprised when the jury acquitted him?

elements.title: Tess Johnston (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that diplomat Tess Johnston wrote more than two dozen books about Shanghai's Western-style architecture?

elements.title: a search-and-rescue otter (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that a search-and-rescue otter, on his first mission, recovered a weapon in a 25-year-old murder case?

elements.title: Bernard de Bluet d'Arbères (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the court jester Bernard de Bluet d'Arbères recounted being forced to recite a sermon from a tree which was being chopped down?

elements.title: a Connecticut TV station (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that a Connecticut TV station offered $100 to the first viewer who called in, twenty times—but nobody called?

elements.title: border deaths (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that more than 63,000 border deaths were documented between 2014 and 2024?

elements.title: a maintenance tram in Prague (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that a maintenance tram in Prague has a Facebook group?

elements.title: Destination of the Month (Wikivoyage recommendations)
elements.contents:
Destination of the Month

San Carlos de Bariloche

The Argentine adventure capital offers great opportunities for skiing, sightseeing, water sports, trekking and climbing amidst the amazing mountainous landscapes of Argentine Patagonia.

elements.title: Off the Beaten Path (Wikivoyage recommendations)
elements.contents:
Off the Beaten Path

Andorra la Vella

Andorra la Vella is the capital of a quirky co-principality lodged in the mountains between Spain and France that offers great skiing, hiking, and lots of duty-free shopping.

elements.title: Featured Travel Topic (Wikivoyage recommendations)
elements.contents:
Featured Travel Topic

San Diego International Airport

The main airport to America's finest city is the busiest single runway airport in the world.
